name: They are Coming (EMT)
description:
It's been a week since an emergency message came up in the TV, telling everyone to remain inside your house and shut close all doors and windows. Although you are not sure of what is happening, sometimes you hear the screams in the distance and recently near your house. The last message you got was "Keep everything closed, they are coming..."

Controls

  • W: Move forward
  • A: Move to the left
  • S: Move backward
  • D: Move to the right

Creators

  • Braulio Baldeón
  • Diego Johnson
  • Mariano de Rivero
